member.summary: The price of goods without any VAT applies to it

member.summary: The amount of VAT that is applied to the net amount

member.summary: The total amount of Net amount and Tax amount

member.name: T:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.RedeemAuthenticationCodeRequestModel
member.summary: Requests used for redeeming an authentication code

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.RedeemAuthenticationCodeRequestModel.Type
member.summary: The type of the authorization code. Always set to "webecr"

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.RedeemAuthenticationCodeRequestModel.Code
member.summary: The authorization code as shown by the POS and entered by the user

member.name: T:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.RefreshTokenRequestModel
member.summary: Requests used for refreshing an access token

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ECRTokenDataRequestModel.EcrId
member.summary: The Identification code of the ECR that will generate the EcrToken field. Used to lookup the appropriate MAC key for validation.Required when an ECR token based validation process is used.

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ECRTokenDataRequestModel.SessionKey
member.summary: The session key used to generate the MAC, encrypted under the master key of the ECR. Required when an ECR token based validation process is used.

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ECRTokenDataRequestModel.EcrToken
member.summary: The ECR token (MAC). Required when an ECR token based validation process is used.

member.name: T:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel
member.summary: Requests used for initiating a new transaction

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.Amount
member.summary: The transaction amount in integer form

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.TipAmount
member.summary: The tip amount in integer from

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.CashbackAmount
member.summary: The cashback amount in integer from

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.IsTaxFree
member.summary: Indicates whether the transaction is eligible to tax free regulation

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.ShouldPreloadTransaction
member.summary: Indicates whether the transaction should be preloaded to the POS device for asynchronous execution Used for cases such as restaurants, deliveries, coffee shops etc

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.PreloadExpiration
member.summary: The expiration of a transaction that is preloaded to a POS, in minutes.The field is mandatory if PreloadTransaction is true

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.IsOnBehalfCollection
member.summary: The payee collects the transaction fund on behalf of another entity Example: courier payment on delivery, food delivery platforms

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.CustomerReference
member.summary: A called defined reference which can be used to reference the intent and eventually the transaction

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.CustomerEmail
member.summary: If provided and supported by the acquirer a transaction receipt will be sent to the email address

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.CustomerPhone
member.summary: If provided and supported by the acquirer a transaction receipt will be sent to the phone

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.InitialTransaction
member.summary: Optional for refund transaction where it references the original debit transaction Required for pre-authorization completion where it references the original pre-authorization transaction request

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.ProviderData
member.summary: A data object representing the relevant data required by Greek law to accompany a provider signature based transaction request

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.ECRTokenData
member.summary: A data object representing the relevant data required by Greek law to accompany an ECR token MAC based transaction request.

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.NewTransactionIntentRequestModel.Timeout
member.summary: If timeout is 0 or not present, the transaction will be initiated asynchronously. If present The service will wait up to "Timeout" seconds before returning to the caller Max timeout is 180s.

member.name: T:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ProviderDataRequestModel
member.summary: The provider data is an object that contains the provider signature and the information needed to validate the signature as defined by the relevant Greek law.

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ProviderDataRequestModel.ProviderName
member.summary: The name of the electronic invoicing provider. It is required for public key lookup. Required when a provider signature validation process is used.

member.name: P:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ProviderDataRequestModel.Signature
member.summary: The electronic invoicing provider signature. Required when a provider signature validation process is used.

member.name: T:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.IntentResult
member.summary: Provides enumeration over the intents results

member.name: F:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.IntentResult.Approved
member.summary: The transaction has been completed and approved by the authorization system

member.name: F:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.IntentResult.Declined
member.summary: The transaction has been completed and declined by the authorization system

member.name: F:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.IntentResult.Cancelled
member.summary: The transaction has been canceled by the POS user before reaching completion

member.name: F:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.IntentResult.Failed
member.summary: The transaction has failed to complete

member.name: F:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.IntentResult.Unknown
member.summary: The transaction result is unknown. Only possible if the device hasn't responded with results

member.name: F:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.IntentResult.Busy
member.summary: The transaction has failed because the POS is currently unavailable for transactions (either processing another transaction or under maintenance)

member.name: F:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.IntentResult.MaxTransactions
member.summary: The POS device has reached its transaction limit for the specific batch. Batch closing should be performed on the device before continuing transactions

member.name: T:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.IntentStatus
member.summary: Provides enumeration over the intent status

member.summary: Intent has been registered to the backend and is pending to be sent to the device

member.name: F:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.IntentStatus.Sent
member.summary: Intent has been registered to the backend and is pending to be sent to the device

member.name: F:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.IntentStatus.Completed
member.summary: Intent has been successfully completed by the device and has registered the results

member.name: T:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ECRAndEFTPOSCommonRoutes
member.summary: The API routes for the ECR and EFT POS common

member.name: M:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ECRAndEFTPOSCommonRoutes.GetTerminalListRoute(System.String)
member.summary: The endpoint is used to retrieve a list of all the terminals that are available to the user. It can be used as a first step to search for a specific terminal by its name, merchant or type and retrieve its terminalId for further processing

member.name: M:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ECRAndEFTPOSCommonRoutes.GetNewTransactionIntentRoute(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: The endpoint is used to start a new transaction by creating an intent.

member.name: M:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ECRAndEFTPOSCommonRoutes.GetTransactionVoidIntentRoute(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: The following endpoint is used to start a new intent to void a transaction. The caller needs to reference the transaction that needs to be voided and has the ability to either reference it via the original transaction intent,or the transaction terminalId. Both values can be obtained either by the response of the original successful intent, or by querying the intent or transaction endpoints.

member.name: M:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ECRAndEFTPOSCommonRoutes.GetTransactionIntentListRoute(System.String)
member.summary: The endpoint is used to list all transaction intents that have been created and accessible to the user. It should be used if the "start transaction intent" call has timed out or was async in order to resolve the final status of a specific intent

member.name: M:ECRAndEFTPOS.Common.ECRAndEFTPOSCommonRoutes.GetTransactionListRoute(System.String)
member.summary: The endpoint is used to list all transaction intents that have been created and accessible to the user. It should be used if the "start transaction intent" call has timed out or was async in order to resolve the final status of a specific intent
